amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to maintain FY24 enacted funding for CISA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to maintain FY24 enacted funding for the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 302 (Roll no. 286).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 302 (Roll no. 286).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
